instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'recharts' for the analytics dashboard (Occupancy Rate, HACCP Scores).
Implement 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list staggering.
Use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for all forms (Reservations, HACCP Logs).
For the Floor Plan, use a CSS Grid approach with draggable elements if possible, or simple static grid for MVP.
HACCP Module MUST have digital signature capability (use a canvas pad or simple checkbox with user auth confirmation).
The 'Kitchen Ticket' card style is key for the Reservation List view - make it look like a physical paper ticket on a digital board.
Ensure Dark Mode is the DEFAULT for the Admin Dashboard.
For the Public Reservation Page, allow a Light/Dark toggle but default to Dark for premium feel.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use the defined 'glass' or 'hero_overlay' gradients.
Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards).
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (Success, Error, HACCP Alerts).
Never use centered text for long paragraphs. Left align for readability.
Spacing is luxury. Don't crowd the HACCP forms. One question per 'screen' or section is better than a giant list on mobile.
